text: Uniharule bhane ki juna pramanaharu hamro samu a'ipugeka chan, tiniharuko maddenajara jasale hamila'i srsti gareko cha, tyasa allaha virud'dha hamile timila'i kahilyai prathamikata dine chainaum, tasartha aba timile je garna cahanchau garihala. Ra timi juna adesa dina sakchau, tyo matra yasai sansarika jindagima dina sakchau
